newsitem.title: CHINA: Angry lover in China kills six, self with bomb.
newsitem.headline: Angry lover in China kills six, self with bomb.

text.p: A woman in the southern Chinese province of Guangdong killed herself, her lover and five others when she set off a bomb to take revenge on her boyfriend after the two had a quarrel, an official said on Tuesday.
The blast in Luoding city on Sunday injured two others, a local media official said by telephone.
The woman had been having an affair with a married man and detonated the bomb after the two had a falling out, the official said.

"They had some misunderstanding with each other and the girl set off a pack of dynamite in the room," he said, adding that the blast nearly demolished the three-storey building where they were staying.
The lovers and other dead and injured had been farmers from another province who came to Luoding in search of work, he said but gave no further details.
Chinese media often carry reports of bombings or revenge attacks carried out by jilted lovers or disgruntled workers.
